leads.lead_text: Stems absent or very short; leaves in a basal rosette, mostly linear to narrow-lanceolate, often with narrow lobes, acute
Stems rhizomatous, widely creeping; leaves cauline, mostly elliptic to narrow- oblanceolate, usually entire, usually obtuse
